message: Bob, I'm offering you this incredible product for $1,400,000. It's a significant value for you, and I believe this price reflects its worth.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $1,300,000. This is my best offer.

Bob, I understand your position.  I'm willing to come down to $1,350,000, but that's my final offer. This product is truly unique and will be worth much more to you than any other option. Let's close this deal.
